Several other variants of epidermolysis bullosa simplex have been proposed, but they appear to be very rare.",GHR,epidermolysis bullosa simplex
How many people are affected by epidermolysis bullosa simplex ?,"The exact prevalence of epidermolysis bullosa simplex is unknown, but this condition is estimated to affect 1 in 30,000 to 50,000
